heroSection.description:
Hello, I'm Zeynab Shamloo, Artist and
Graphic Designer Based in Tehran.

aboutSection.title: About
aboutSection.description: I am mostly interested in working on creative designs and illustrations to raise awareness and gross in the community. I enable people and businesses to apply a human-centered approach to analyze and solve problems with effective designs. Every feature should strive for impact and quality. I use design processes, techniques, and principles to create the impact we desire, memorable customer experiences we want to drive, and, ultimately, the products people love. No matter how niche or technical the domain or the user, I help, product teams focus on the humans using technology.
